name: Togetic

attacks.name: Metronome
attacks.effect: Pick an attack from any Pokemon in play, except this Pokemon. This attack copies that attack. If this Pokemon cannot pay for its Energy cost, flip a coin. If heads, you may use the attack without paying its cost.

attacks.name: Fey Wind
attacks.effect: You may draw a card. Either way, your opponent draws a card.

flavor: Fear of abandonment leaves them attached to their shells.
